      Starts a timer for a ToolUser. After the provided number of seconds have passed, the ToolUser will be aborted if this h
      Parameters:

      time - The amount of time (in milliseconds).

    • abortToolUser

      public void abortToolUser(UUID playerUUID)
      Stops and removes a player (defined by their UUID) if it is currently active. "Stop" here means that it will make sure to properly clean up the ToolUser.

      If no ToolUser is active for the given player, nothing happens.

      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The UUID of the player whose ToolUser to stop and remove.

    • abortToolUser

      public void abortToolUser(ToolUser toolUser)
      Stops and removes a ToolUser. "Stop" here means that it will make sure to properly clean up the ToolUser.
      Parameters:
      toolUser - The ToolUser to stop and remove.
